title: [机械|传送|安全]GGTeleport———————简单又实用的一个插插件[全版本通用]
author: 2508970590@qq.c
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2508970590@qq.c 于 2015-2-26 11:42 编辑 

大家好，我们又见面了，今天给大家带来一个失传已久的GGTeleport随机传送插件，弥补了RandomPlacer传送会卡的BUGRandomPlacer传送门：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-189983-1-1.html
接下来是配置文本：


###############
# GG Teleport #
# By  GusGold #
###############
#   Config    #
###############

# NOTE:
#    - Delete this file to regenerate it with default values
#    - If values are not viable, default will be used

Version: 0.9.3
checkForUpdates: true

# Default radius used on /tpr command
xRadius: 250   这是x半径，可以调到你想要的传送半径
zRadius: 250   这个也一样

# List of block's Data Values that you don't want to be teleported on to
# Official List can be found at http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Data_values
blockBlackList:
- 8
- 9
- 10
- 11

# To have a portal that activates /tpr, make a real portal in your world
# then put the coordinates of a box that contains the portal down below
# Make sure your world is spelled correctly. Leave world black to disable
portal:
  world: world
  pos1:
    X: -10
    Y: 63
    Z: -10
  pos2:
    X: 10
    Y: 66
    Z: 10

# Maximum tries per run to find a viable spawn location
# (Higher value = potentially more delay)
# Set to -1 for unlimited tries (Likely to enter near-infinite loop)
maximumTries: 100

replies.author: 2508970590@qq.c
replies.txt_content:
2508970590@qq.c 发表于 2015-2-26 11:44
求人气啊，不给力
那个tpr插件随机传送后会卡在原地一直掉，最烦人的就是这个

replies.author: 2508970590@qq.c
replies.txt_content:
dacz0768sda11 发表于 2015-2-26 11:46
不错，很好用
这个插件弥补了RandomPlacer插件的不足，让玩家不会卡在原地一直掉，而且传送不会卡，卡不卡要源于你的半径
xRadius：250
zRadius：250
调的远就会卡，除非你是专业服务器，调到1000延迟1秒

replies.txt_content: 我现在求链接还来得及吗？
